1411100.name: Fantasy Grounds - FG Town Maps 2
1411100.description:
Create a customized town quickly within Fantasy Grounds Unity using these art assets by Joshua Watmough. You can quickly create a town in a forest, desert, island or snowy terrain and you can use these decorations with other art packs for even greater creativity.
Note: This pack requires Fantasy Grounds Unity.
This pack comes with all new art from Joshua Watmough to allow Gamemasters to create their own town maps.
  • Use advanced brush techniques in Fantasy Grounds Unity to add a fence or stone wall around a town. Use it to paint a river or road running through the village.
  • Choose from a wide range of backgrounds for your town: jungle, sand, snow, water, dirt, desert
  • Choose from 3 different island tiles that work well over the water background
  • Use the paint tools to decorate your town with structures or to paint on grass, dirt, embankments, hedges and more
Help Resources to Maximize use of this product:
  • Using the Asset Window
  • Creating Maps with the Brush Tool
  • Creating Maps with Tiles
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Joshua Watmough
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software
